title: 'Raising Ali' Remembers The 'Worst Mess In The History Of Sports'
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel talks to Gary Robinov, director of Raising Ali, a film about the 50th anniversary of the heavyweight boxing match between Mohammed Ali and Sonny Liston in Lewiston, Maine.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
